IntroductionÂ¶

The Aviation Event Statistics (IO-AVSTATS) includes the following applications:

  • ae1982 - Aviation Event Analysis

  • pd1982 - IO-AVSTATS-DB Database Profiling

  • slara - Association Rule Analysis
